    • Method Detail

      • containsKey

        boolean containsKey(ByteBuffer key,
                  StoreTransaction txh)
                    throws StorageException
        Returns true if the specified key exists in the store, i.e. there is at least one column-value pair for the key.
        Parameters:
        key - Key
        txh - Transaction
        Returns:
        TRUE, if key has at least one column-value pair, else FALSE
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • getSlice

        List<Entry> getSlice(KeySliceQuery query,
                   StoreTransaction txh)
                     throws StorageException
        Retrieves the list of entries (i.e. column-value pairs) for a specified query.
        Parameters:
        query - Query to get results for
        txh - Transaction
        Returns:
        List of entries up to a maximum of "limit" entries
        Throws:
        StorageException - when columnEnd < columnStart as determined in ByteBufferUtil.isSmallerThan(ByteBuffer, ByteBuffer)
        See Also:
        KeySliceQuery

      • get

        ByteBuffer get(ByteBuffer key,
             ByteBuffer column,
             StoreTransaction txh)
               throws StorageException
        Retrieves the value for the specified column and key under the given transaction from the store if such exists, otherwise NULL
        Parameters:
        key - Key
        column - Column
        txh - Transaction
        Returns:
        Value for key and column or NULL
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • containsKeyColumn

        boolean containsKeyColumn(ByteBuffer key,
                        ByteBuffer column,
                        StoreTransaction txh)
                          throws StorageException
        Returns true if the specified key-column pair exists in the store.
        Parameters:
        key - Key
        column - Column
        txh - Transaction
        Returns:
        TRUE, if key has at least one column-value pair, else FALSE
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • mutate

        void mutate(ByteBuffer key,
          List<Entry> additions,
          List<ByteBuffer> deletions,
          StoreTransaction txh)
            throws StorageException
        Applies the specified insertion and deletion mutations to the provided key. Both, the list of additions or deletions, may be empty or NULL if there is nothing to be added and/or deleted.
        Parameters:
        key - Key
        additions - List of entries (column + value) to be added
        deletions - List of columns to be removed
        txh - Transaction under which to execute the operation
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • acquireLock

        void acquireLock(ByteBuffer key,
               ByteBuffer column,
               ByteBuffer expectedValue,
               StoreTransaction txh)
                 throws StorageException
        Acquires a lock for the key-column pair which ensures that nobody else can take a lock on that respective entry for the duration of this lock (but somebody could potentially still overwrite the key-value entry without taking a lock). The expectedValue defines the value expected to match the value at the time the lock is acquired (or null if it is expected that the key-column pair does not exist).

        If this method is called multiple times with the same key-column pair in the same transaction, all but the first invocation are ignored.

        The lock has to be released when the transaction closes (commits or aborts).

        Parameters:
        key - Key on which to lock
        column - Column the column on which to lock
        expectedValue - The expected value for the specified key-column pair on which to lock. Null if it is expected that the pair does not exist
        txh - Transaction
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • getKeys

        RecordIterator<ByteBuffer> getKeys(StoreTransaction txh)
                                   throws StorageException
        Returns an iterator over all keys in this store. The keys may be ordered but not necessarily.
        Returns:
        An iterator over all keys in this store.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying store does not support this operation. Check StoreFeatures.supportsScan() first.
        StorageException

      • getLocalKeyPartition

        ByteBuffer[] getLocalKeyPartition()
                                  throws StorageException
        Returns an array that describes the key boundaries of the locally hosted partition of this store.

        The array has two entries: the first marks the lower bound for the keys stored locally (inclusive) and the other marks the upper bound (exclusive).

        Returns:
        An array with two entries describing the locally hosted partition of this store.
        Throws:
        StorageException
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying store does not support this operation. Check StoreFeatures.hasLocalKeyPartition() first.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this store. Each store has a unique name which is used to open it.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        KeyColumnValueStoreManager.openDatabase(String)

      • close

        void close()
           throws StorageException
        Closes this store
        Throws:
        StorageException
